group.label: Ethics approval and consent to participate
group.name: EthicsHeading

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: This study was performed in accordance with the French law on bioethics (revised July 7, 2011, number 2011-814). The experimental protocol was approved by the Montpellier University Hospital (CHU Montpellier) as part of the molecular diagnostic activity. The authorization number given by the Regional Health Agency (ARS) is LR/2013-No 190.
